meanings: look down on, make light of, take sb[sth] lightly

vlive.korean: 어리다고 얕보지 말아! Just because I'm young, don't assume I'm going to be easy! 듣기 View video V Special : [우설리] 다현을 두고 벌인 은우와 문빈의 댄스배틀! (베스트영상 후보2)
vlive.english: Just because I'm young, don't assume I'm going to be easy!

vlive.korean: [선생님들] 저희를 너무 얕보신 거 아니에요? [Coaches] You really underestimated us, didn't you? 듣기 View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.05 - Part.1
vlive.english: [Coaches] You really underestimated us, didn't you?

vlive.korean: 너무 얕봤다. I took it too lightly. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 마마무 데뷔 3주년 V앱
내가 바나를 너무 얕봤나 봐. I think I underestimated them. 듣기 View video B1A4 : 깜짝 공찬's 게임한판
윤형이 형이 까르보나라하면... 우릴 너무 얕본 건데. Yunhyeong is carbonara expert. They looked down on us. 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 2탄 '코니의 장보기미션!!'
vlive.english: Yunhyeong is carbonara expert. They looked down on us.

examples.korean: Do not disparage anyone's contribution. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다른 사람들의 공헌을 얕보지 마라. 절대어휘 5100

examples.korean: Don't make light of this computer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 컴퓨터를 얕보지 마라. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
